City of Presidio Council Meetings
---------------------------------

*City of Presidio Council meetings are conducted either the first and/or third Monday of each month at 6:00 p.m. at the Presidio Activity Center (PAC), 1200 E. O’Reilly St., Presidio, Texas.*

[![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/about-us.icon_.png)

If you wish to be added to the email list for agendas, please email your request to City Secretary at bornelas@presidiotx.us.](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=5386#)

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/about-us.icon-2-1.png)

[Agenda & Meetings](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=5964&preview_id=5964)

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Solar-And-Art-Fest-019-1024x818.jpg)

* First and/or third Monday of each month
* 1200 E. O'Reilly St., Presidio, Texas

###### 432-229-3517
